The New Canon

Hello, it's Csongor.

Beside writing I do web design and development. And running a small online store.

For any questions feel free to contact me at bartus.csongor@gmail.com.

This is my mindmap, my newsledge distilled from books and articles since 2006.

To help the current metasystem transition I've developed new senses defining new values.

Many people helped me to form this worldwiew. I recommend them warmly.
